headline: Mondelz International to Report Q3 2025 Financial Results on October 28, 2025
summary: CHICAGO, Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mondelz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) will release its third quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, October 28, 2025 at 4:05 p.m. ET and will host a conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET that day. Investors and analysts may participate via phone by calling 800-225-9448 from the United States and 203-518-9708 from other locations. To ensure timely access, participants should dial in approximately 10 minutes before the call starts. A listen-only webca

headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
